timeline.headline: GyeongSeok Seo's profile
timeline.text: Hello all! let me introduce myself : ). see the my profile timeline!!

date.headline: University Life
date.text:
student life! software! study! study! study!
I got bachelor's degree in software engineering from Sangmyeong University. in this time.. Intensively studied in the following areas : embedded software and C language.

date.headline: Army
date.text: South Korea has adopted the conscription system. so every man go to army and two and half year! so... I also go to army, and completed own duty.

date.headline: My first JOB!
date.text:
I join a company of Tmax Soft. my first job grading is Associate Research Engineer.
TmaxSoft is a South Korea-based multinational corporation specializing in enterprise software system. It was founded in 1997 by former KAIST professor Daeyeon Park. Its notable products include the ProFrame application framework and Tmax transaction process monitoring solution.

date.headline: My first Project!
date.text:
MFC share library development. working on framework team.
These library's purpose is compatibility provides to tmaxwindow. easy talk. Window's software run on tmaxWindow.

date.headline: Change company
date.text:
S-Core, I'm working on this company.
Samsung SDS was acquired TmaxCore. so S-Core is a subsidiary company and change the name TmaxCore to S-Core.

date.headline: WAC
date.text: WAC project, I'm join the web technology world!!

date.headline: Promotion
date.text: I was promoted to Advisor Engineer. very happy to me! : )

date.headline: TIZEN 1.0
date.text:
TIZEN 1.0 project, I was assigned IDE project. Tizen IDE based on Eclipse FW.
Tizen released version 1.0, code-named Larkspur.

date.headline: TIZEN 2.0 alpha
date.text:
TIZEN 2.0 alpha project, I was assigned IDE project.
Tizen released version 2.0 alpha, code-named Magnolia.

date.headline: TIZEN 2.0
date.text:
TIZEN 2.0 project, I was assigned IDE project.
This project is currently underway. we are working for successfully Tizen2.0 release.
